Risk_Description: Algorithmic bias in decision-making creates unfair outcomes
Example_Scenarios: Hiring AI favoring male candidates; Loan approval disproportionately denying demographics; Healthcare AI providing different treatment recommendations; Recruiting AI filtering out qualified underrepresented candidates
Potential_Impacts: Legal liability, regulatory investigations, reputation damage, customer loss, human rights violations

Example_Scenarios: Facial recognition failing darker skin tones; Voice recognition struggling with accents; Content recommendations reinforcing stereotypes; AI screening excluding marginalized groups
Potential_Impacts: Discrimination complaints, regulatory non-compliance, community backlash, brand damage, exclusion of talent

Risk_Description: Lack of representativeness in training data
Example_Scenarios: Medical AI trained on one demographic; Language model English-only serving multilingual; Image recognition Western faces serving global; Product recommendations from one region
Potential_Impacts: Poor model performance, compromised effectiveness, costly retraining, missed opportunities, regulatory scrutiny

Example_Scenarios: Image generation producing stereotypes; Content moderation treating bias discussions as violations; Search ranking surfacing biased content; Ads reinforcing demographic stereotypes
Potential_Impacts: Public criticism, social media backlash, reputation damage, lost partnerships, negative media coverage

Example_Scenarios: Hackers accessing cloud training environments; Insiders misusing permissions; Phishing credential theft; API keys exposed publicly
Potential_Impacts: Model theft, service disruption, financial losses, regulatory fines, legal liability

Example_Scenarios: Customer data from chat logs exposed; Training data with PII shared publicly; AI insights revealing identifiable information; Third-party vendor breach affecting your data
Potential_Impacts: PIPEDA/PIPA violations, regulatory fines, notification costs, class action lawsuits, severe reputation damage

Example_Scenarios: Adversarial injection of misleading data; Supply chain attacks corrupting training data; Model inversion extracting information; Backdoor attacks embedding triggers
Potential_Impacts: Compromised accuracy, production failures, security vulnerabilities, need for retraining, lost customer trust

Example_Scenarios: Competitors using extraction techniques; Insiders selling proprietary code; Cloud breach exposing models; API endpoints allowing unlimited querying
Potential_Impacts: Loss of competitive advantage, financial losses, eroded value propositions, damaged investments, IP enforcement difficulty

Example_Scenarios: Shared credentials for multiple users; Overly permissive privileges; Failed removal for terminated employees; Insufficient logging and monitoring
Potential_Impacts: Unauthorized data access, inability to detect incidents, compliance failures, regulatory penalties, legal liability

Example_Scenarios: Deep learning loan denial without explanation; AI hiring ranking without criteria transparency; Automated medical diagnosis without basis; Fraud detection flagging without disclosure
Potential_Impacts: Legal challenges, regulatory non-compliance, loss of user trust, inability to debug, audit failures

Example_Scenarios: Neural networks making critical decisions; Ensemble models obscuring contributions; Reinforcement learning evolving behaviors; Generative AI unknown reasoning
Potential_Impacts: Inability to validate decisions, regulatory rejection, user rejection, ethical concerns, hidden biases

Example_Scenarios: Customers unaware AI handling support; Employees using AI without understanding limitations; Public believing AI content is human; Stakeholders not informed about AI decisions
Potential_Impacts: Regulatory violation, consumer protection lawsuits, loss of trust, inappropriate reliance, ethical concerns

Risk_Description: Failure to document AI decision logic
Example_Scenarios: No records of training procedures; Missing feature engineering documentation; Unclear decision thresholds; Lost version control history
Potential_Impacts: Inability to reproduce decisions, compliance failures, debugging difficulty, legal challenges, regulatory scrutiny

Example_Scenarios: High percentage duplicates or corrupted records; Outdated data not reflecting current conditions; Incomplete data with missing values; Sourced data from inappropriate contexts
Potential_Impacts: Poor model performance, unreliable outputs, failure to meet objectives, wasted resources, production failures

Example_Scenarios: Training on normal conditions but not failures; Missing data for rare critical events; Geographic bias insufficient coverage; Temporal gaps missing seasonal patterns
Potential_Impacts: Model failure in edge cases, poor underrepresented scenarios, inability to handle rare events, user dissatisfaction, safety failures

Example_Scenarios: Unable to trace to original sources; Unclear transformation documentation; Missing collection method metadata; Unknown ownership or licensing
Potential_Impacts: Compliance failures, legal liability, inability to audit quality, IP infringement risks, regulatory investigation

Example_Scenarios: Consumer behavior changing; Seasonal variations unaccounted; Market conditions shifting; Operational environments changing unexpectedly
Potential_Impacts: Gradual accuracy decline, silent failures, business metric deterioration, customer churn, expensive retraining

Example_Scenarios: Failure to conduct required impact assessments; Not registering high-risk systems; Non-compliance sector-specific rules; Violating emerging governance laws
Potential_Impacts: Regulatory investigations, financial penalties, mandatory shutdowns, legal liability, market access restrictions

Example_Scenarios: Missing required impact assessments; Inadequate risk management evidence; Insufficient bias testing records; Incomplete audit trail
Potential_Impacts: Regulatory findings, approval delays, denial of benefits, expensive remediation, legal exposure

Example_Scenarios: Deploying AI globally different privacy regimes; Conflicting federal and provincial laws; Overlapping sector regulations; International data transfer restrictions
Potential_Impacts: Unable to deploy consistent solutions, high compliance costs, regulatory uncertainty, business restrictions, complex management

Risk_Description: Copyright and IP infringement from AI outputs
Example_Scenarios: Generative AI producing similar copyrighted works; Models trained on copyrighted material unauthorized; AI code incorporating patented algorithms; AI outputs violating trademark guidelines
Potential_Impacts: Copyright lawsuits and damages, forced removal, legal injunctions halting operations, financial liability, brand damage

Example_Scenarios: Model crashes unexpected input; Infrastructure failures; Cloud provider outages; Software bugs version incompatibilities
Potential_Impacts: Business process interruptions, lost revenue, customer dissatisfaction, reputation damage, emergency fix costs

Example_Scenarios: Accuracy below requirements; Increased false positives; Response times exceeding SLAs; Outputs inconsistent unpredictable
Potential_Impacts: Poor user experience, flawed decision-making, revenue losses, costly retraining, eroded trust

Example_Scenarios: AI making critical decisions without review; No monitoring alerting to issues; Automated processes without fallback; Lack of escalation procedures
Potential_Impacts: Costly uncorrected errors, safety hazards, regulatory non-compliance, loss of control, legal liability

Example_Scenarios: Employees confused by new workflows; Existing processes breaking; Reliance preventing manual fallback; Technical integration issues
Potential_Impacts: Productivity losses, employee resistance, customer service degradation, failed projects, financial losses

Example_Scenarios: Medical AI incorrect diagnosis leading harm; Autonomous vehicle unsafe navigation; Financial AI recommending investment losses; Emergency response failing to route resources
